content:
The Whole Wheat Cinnamon Swirl Bread recipe from King Arthur Flour calls for:

* 1/2 cup (100g) granulated sugar

You'll also need a small amount of sugar for the cinnamon sugar topping, which is:

* 2 tablespoons (25g) granulated sugar

So, in total, you'll need about 3/4 cup (125g) of granulated sugar. If you have that amount or more in your pantry, you're all set!

Remember to check the recipe for any other ingredients you might need to pick up, and don't hesitate to ask if you have any more questions.
